AgendaItems.Title: Confirmation of Minutes of 26th Meeting
AgendaItems.Details: Minutes of the 26th Finance Committee meeting held on September 24, 2015, were circulated and confirmed incorporating suggestions by JS & FA and Director (NITs). Draft minutes will be circulated for perusal and suggestions before confirmation.

AgendaItems.Title: Action taken on 26th Meeting decisions
AgendaItems.Details: Action Taken Report reviewed. Observations included corrections to BWC item references, replacing 'deviation' with 'quantified variation', preparation of a Fact-Finding Report for Item 34.7, correction of typographical errors in audit annexure. Recommendations included creating an Institute-level Audit Cell, physical verification of assets, and certification of statutory dues.

AgendaItems.Title: Financial Status as on November 27, 2015
AgendaItems.Details: Noted financial status. Expenditure should be planned within Rs. 50.00 Crores Non-Plan funds and Rs. 80.00 Crores Plan funds.

AgendaItems.Title: Audit Report on 2014-15 accounts
AgendaItems.Details: Perused Audit Report and annexure. Recommendations: respond to audit observations promptly, place Compliance Report and annexure in next FC meeting.

AgendaItems.Title: Estimate for Electromechanical work in Sports Complex Swimming Pool
AgendaItems.Details: Administrative approval previously accorded. Committee suggested greater scrutiny, comparative study, and reconsideration by BWC.

AgendaItems.Title: Approval for installation of 15 lifts in various buildings
AgendaItems.Details: Lifts essential for Persons with Disabilities. NIT Agartala to approach MHRD for related scheme.

AgendaItems.Title: Ornamental False Ceiling and HVAC in Seminar Halls
AgendaItems.Details: Estimate accepted for consideration by BoG.

AgendaItems.Title: Construction of Central Lecture Hall Complex with 27 Class Rooms
AgendaItems.Details: Necessity agreed. FC suggested resubmission to BWC with technical details, Smart Class Rooms, furniture, and reference to NIT Durgapur project.

AgendaItems.Title: Revised Budget 2015-16
AgendaItems.Details: Approved with recommendation to plan expenditure within available grants and prioritize projects.

AgendaItems.Title: Medical re-imbursement claim of Shri Dilip Kumar Ghosh
AgendaItems.Details: Shri Ghosh advised to apply to State Government Medical Board for ex-post facto approval. Matter to be placed in next FC meeting.

AgendaItems.Title: Status of TEQIP-II Project
AgendaItems.Details: Noted present status and achievements under the project.

AgendaItems.Title: Physical & Financial Statement of ongoing construction works/projects
AgendaItems.Details: Committee noted statements. Advised prioritization and phased execution within available grants.

AgendaItems.Title: Expansion of Campus Wide Networking (Phase III)
AgendaItems.Details: Recommended proposal. FC suggested formation of a committee for estimates, including IIT Guwahati, NIT Patna, NIC, and NIT Agartala members.

AgendaItems.Title: Any other item with permission of the Chair

SubItems.Title: Items approved by BWC in 34th meeting (34.8, 34.9, 34.10)
SubItems.Details: Modified minutes of 34th BWC to be placed before FC for consideration.

FinanceCommitteeMinutes.Closure: Meeting ended with a vote of thanks to the Chair.
